game.name: Morphies Law: Remorphed
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Morphies Law is a wacky mass stealing, robot morphing 3D shooter where size really matters!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Morphies Law is a wacky mass stealing, robot morphing 3D shooter where size really matters!

reviewHighlights.text: Absolutely a beautiful game, love the colour usage. fun gameplay. cool game mechanics. sadly it's just few players to play with.
